leader: Automation of customer service processes requires business empathy, technical ability, and operational know-how.
follower: I combine 10+ years of experience in customer service with a BSc in Contemporary Software Development (first class honours, 2024) and a focus on deployment agility. These traits are evident from my recent projects.
about_me: All but the last two years of my career have been spent in customer service. Throughout this time I've had a passion for programming in general and for automation in particular. In March 2023 I became solely responsible for implementing and designing automations for my team using a low-code, in-house tool similar to UiPath. I graduated with a BSc in Contemporary Software Development with first class honours in May 2024.
